benchmark_details.name: EusIE (Euskara Informazio-Erauzketa)
benchmark_details.overview: EusIE is the first Event Extraction benchmark for the Basque language, designed to evaluate the performance of cross-lingual transfer learning in Event Extraction tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To present the first Basque Event Extraction benchmark and analyze the impact of linguistic typology on cross-lingual transfer quality.

data.source: Annotated from a snapshot of Basque Wikipedia focusing on events-related documents.

methodology.calculation: F1 scores calculated for each task using gold annotations.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 scores indicate better transfer quality in event extraction tasks.
methodology.validation: Evaluated using cross-validation across multiple languages.
